review_body: Very unreliable. Frequently freezes at loading screen with spinning circle
Can't use back button anymore! That makes navigation much more cumbersome. For some reason, I am unable to view patients in the ICU after recent updates
Removed ability to use the back button, navigating back and forth through patient lists is miserable now. Please fix immediately
No longer able to log in on note 10 plus. Authentication error every time I try. Worked fine a few weeks ago.
Horrible. No back button functionality now menus are impossible to navigate.
Can't log in any more and they can't help me

Doesn't resize text if you use slightly larger text in Android system settings. Makes most things in the app unreadable unless you downsize your system don't, which I don't want to do just for this app. Samsung Galaxy note 10+
connects and allows log in after set up only once. If app is close, it will not be able to recognize URL and will not log in. Iphones do not have this problem
Great way to manage patient care anytime and from anywhere!
Still no way to interact. "View only"
Make Healthcare better and it's future of Healthcare
